root.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08
root.description: Game Face: Launch Fiasco, No Eyebrows Tiger Woods 08 introduced the Game Face feature, by which users can import a file via a web interface into the game. At launch, and for the following few weeks, this feature was severely crippled by slow web services and a sketchy uploading process. Once the initial surge of demand passed, the system stabilized and functionality was re-established, not without triggering a storm of user complaints. Moreover, the Game Face feature lacked the ability to add eyebrows to created characters, although eyebrows could be added to non-Game Face characters. This significantly diminished the photorealistic effect the feature was meant to deliver.RosterMale Golfers Tiger Woods Ricky Barnes Michael Campbell John Daly Chris DiMarco Luke Donald Steve Elkington Jim Furyk Retief Goosen J. B.
